recap_documents.description: ORDER granting 50 Defendants' Motion to Dismiss for the reasons stated in the attached memorandum. Accordingly, all claims are dismissed without prejudice under Rule 12(b)(6) of the Federal Rules of Civil Procedure. Plaintiff's request to amend the complaint (ECF No. 51 at 47) is granted. On or before August 30, 2024, Plaintiff may file a Second Amended Complaint. Plaintiff must also file a redline comparison of the First and Second Amended Complaints. Failure to timely file a Second Amended Complaint will result in dismissal of all claims with prejudice.Signed by Judge Vernon D. Oliver on 07/31/2024. (Dao, J) (Entered: 07/31/2024)
